Our app allows you to scan or upload a b: Our app allows you to scan or upload a barcode to retrieve detailed information about a product. You can also proceed to our chatbot for further information and support in various languages including English, French, Swahili, Hausa, Amharic, Zulu, Twi, and Omoro.
How do I use the barcode scanner?: How do I use the barcode scanner?
To use the barcode scanner, simply tap o: To use the barcode scanner, simply tap on the Scan button, align the barcode within the viewfinder, and the app will automatically detect and retrieve the product details. Ensure your camera has sufficient lighting for accurate scanning.
Can I upload a barcode image instead of: Can I upload a barcode image instead of scanning?
Yes, you can upload a barcode image by s: Yes, you can upload a barcode image by selecting the Upload option. Choose an image from your gallery that clearly shows the barcode. The app will process the image and provide product details similar to scanning.
What languages does the app support?: What languages does the app support?
Our app supports multiple languages, inc: Our app supports multiple languages, including English, French, Swahili, Hausa, Amharic, Zulu, Twi, and Omoro. You can select your preferred language from the settings to view product information and interact with the chatbot in that language.
How can I get more information about a p: How can I get more information about a product?
After retrieving the product details, yo: After retrieving the product details, you have the option to chat with our chatbot for more in-depth information. The chatbot can assist you with additional product inquiries, availability, and other related questions.
What should I do if the app does not rec: What should I do if the app does not recognize my barcode?
If the app does not recognize your barco: If the app does not recognize your barcode, please ensure the barcode is clear and well-lit. If you still encounter issues, try uploading a different image or contacting our support team for assistance.
For any issues or support inquiries, you: For any issues or support inquiries, you can contact us through the Help section in the app or email us directly at support@yourappdomain.com. We’re here to help you with any questions or problems you may have.
Is my data safe with this app?: Is my data safe with this app?
Yes, your data privacy and security are: Yes, your data privacy and security are our top priorities. We use encryption and secure protocols to protect your information. For more details, please refer to our privacy policy available in the app.
We collect and use data to provide accur: We collect and use data to provide accurate product details after scanning or uploading barcodes. Your personal data will be protected in accordance with our privacy policy.
You are responsible for ensuring that yo: You are responsible for ensuring that you have the legal right to scan or upload any barcode. We provide information based on available product data, but we do not guarantee its accuracy or completeness.
We are not liable for any damages that a: We are not liable for any damages that arise from the use of incorrect or outdated product information. Please verify product details through our chatbot if necessary.
The chatbot is provided to help you with: The chatbot is provided to help you with additional product queries. The chatbot responses are for informational purposes only and do not constitute professional advice
You must use the app in accordance with: You must use the app in accordance with the law and refrain from submitting false or misleading data
We reserve the right to modify these ter: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Please review them periodically to stay informed of updates.
